section.title: Release 1.12 (TBA)
section.para: This release has the following new features:

listitem.para: It is no longer necessary to set the NIX_REMOTE environment variable if you need to use the Nix daemon. Nix will use the daemon automatically if you donâ€™t have write access to the Nix database.

The Nix language now supports floating point numbers. They are based on regular C++ float and compatible with existing integers and number-related operations. Export and import to and from JSON and XML works, too.
